action.text: Hello. ^start(animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1) this is Zenek. I will be interviewing you on a job you applied for. Before we start let's make a demo, throughout the interview you will be given 10 seconds to answer each question, after the time limit I will continue with the next question. ^wait(animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1)

startAction.text: How did you find out about this job offer?
Let's talk about you. What are your hobbies, your expectations and goals?
Why are you interested in this job offer?
In which ways you find yourself suitable for this position?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
Let's talk about your personal traits. Can you give 3 traits that suits you most?
What do you think about your leadership skills? What kind of a leader would you be?
Can you give an example that demonstrates your leadership skills?
If you get an another job offer, how would you feel?

action.text: The ^start(animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1)interview is over, thank you for your participation we will inform you about your progress.^wait(animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1)
